EnabledConditions.Name: Enabled Conditions
EnabledConditions.Hint: Configure which conditions display as large overlays on tokens.

OverlaySize.Name: Overlay Size
OverlaySize.Hint: Size multiplier for status overlay icons (1.0 = token size)

OverlayOpacity.Name: Overlay Opacity
OverlayOpacity.Hint: Opacity of status overlay icons (0.1 = very transparent, 1.0 = fully opaque)

OverlayPosition.Name: Overlay Position
OverlayPosition.Hint: Where to position single overlays on the token (center or corners)

StackingMode.Name: Multi-Condition Stacking
StackingMode.Hint: How multiple condition overlays arrange on tokens (overlapping, stacked grid, or circular)

GlobalAnimation.Name: Global Animation Type
GlobalAnimation.Hint: Animation effect for all overlays (can be overridden per-condition)

ConditionSettings.Name: Per-Condition Settings
ConditionSettings.Hint: Individual color, glow, and animation settings for each condition

MatchingMode.Name: Condition Matching Mode
MatchingMode.Hint: How to match effect names: partial matching is more forgiving, exact matching is stricter

ShowDuration.Name: Show Effect Duration
ShowDuration.Hint: Display remaining duration/rounds on overlay icons

AnimationSpeed.Name: Animation Speed
AnimationSpeed.Hint: How fast animations play (Very Slow to Very Fast)

EnableBorders.Name: Enable Token Borders
EnableBorders.Hint: Add colored borders to tokens with active conditions

EnableBadges.Name: Enable Condition Badges
EnableBadges.Hint: Show numbered badges displaying condition count on tokens

EnableTooltips.Name: Enable Tooltips
EnableTooltips.Hint: Show condition names when hovering over overlays

EnableShake.Name: Enable Shake Effect
EnableShake.Hint: Tokens with certain conditions will shake/vibrate

MaxOverlays.Name: Maximum Overlays Per Token
MaxOverlays.Hint: Maximum number of overlay icons to show on a single token (1-10)

UsePriority.Name: Use Priority System
UsePriority.Hint: When max overlays is reached, show highest priority conditions only

EnableSounds.Name: Enable Sound Effects
EnableSounds.Hint: Play sounds when conditions are applied or removed

DarkMode.Name: Dark Mode UI
DarkMode.Hint: Use darker colors for the configuration menus

ConditionAliases.Name: Condition Aliases
ConditionAliases.Hint: Map multiple effect names to the same condition

IconOverrides.Name: Icon Overrides
IconOverrides.Hint: Use custom icons instead of default effect icons

SceneSettings.Name: Scene-Specific Settings
SceneSettings.Hint: Different overlay configurations for different scenes

DebugMode.Name: Debug Mode
DebugMode.Hint: Show performance metrics and matching information in console

ConfigMenu.Name: Condition Configuration
ConfigMenu.Label: Configure Conditions
ConfigMenu.Hint: Choose which status effects display as large overlays and customize their appearance.

PresetsMenu.Name: System Presets
PresetsMenu.Label: Apply System Preset
PresetsMenu.Hint: Load pre-configured condition sets for different game systems (D&D 5e, Pathfinder 2e, etc)

AliasesMenu.Name: Condition Aliases
AliasesMenu.Label: Configure Aliases
AliasesMenu.Hint: Map alternative effect names to conditions for better matching

TrackDuration.Name: Track Effect Duration
TrackDuration.Hint: Monitor and respond to remaining duration on active effects

DurationColorCoding.Name: Duration Color Coding
DurationColorCoding.Hint: Overlay color changes based on remaining time (red for expiring soon)

EffectSourceFilter.Name: Effect Source Filter
EffectSourceFilter.Hint: Which effects to track: Actor, Token, or Both

EnableParticles.Name: Enable Particle Effects
EnableParticles.Hint: Show particle effects (sparkles, flames, etc) based on condition type

VisualTheme.Name: Visual Theme
VisualTheme.Hint: Choose a preset visual theme for overlays (Dark Fantasy, Cyberpunk, Minimalist, etc)

EnableAutomation.Name: Enable Automation
EnableAutomation.Hint: Enable condition chains and auto-apply rules

EnableAnalytics.Name: Enable Analytics
EnableAnalytics.Hint: Track condition statistics and generate combat reports

PlayerVisibility.Name: Player Condition Visibility
PlayerVisibility.Hint: Which conditions are visible to players: All, Public Only, or GM Only

GMOnlyConditions.Name: GM-Only Conditions
GMOnlyConditions.Hint: Conditions visible only to GMs, hidden from players

ExcludeList.Name: Exclude List
ExcludeList.Hint: Tokens and actors to exclude from overlay display

CompoundConditions.Name: Compound Conditions
CompoundConditions.Hint: Detect combinations of conditions (e.g., vulnerable + poisoned)

Accessibility.Name: Accessibility Mode
Accessibility.Hint: Choose accessibility mode: Normal, High Contrast, Colorblind Friendly, or Text Labels

FilterButtons.Name: Enable Filter Buttons
FilterButtons.Hint: Show quick-filter buttons (Debuffs, Buffs, All) in UI

AnimationSequences.Name: Animation Sequences
AnimationSequences.Hint: Chained animations (pulse → glow → bounce) for dramatic effects

AutomationMenu.Name: Automation Configuration
AutomationMenu.Label: Configure Automation
AutomationMenu.Hint: Set up condition chains, auto-apply rules, and batch operations

AnalyticsDashboard.Name: Analytics Dashboard
AnalyticsDashboard.Label: View Analytics
AnalyticsDashboard.Hint: See statistics on condition usage, affected tokens, and combat reports

EnableAISuggestions.Name: Enable AI Suggestions
EnableAISuggestions.Hint: Allow the AI system to suggest conditions based on learning patterns

EnableSharing.Name: Enable Community Sharing
EnableSharing.Hint: Allow sharing and downloading condition presets from the community library

EnableSpellAutoApply.Name: Enable Spell Auto-Apply
EnableSpellAutoApply.Hint: Automatically apply conditions when spells/abilities are used

MobileOptimization.Name: Enable Mobile Optimization
MobileOptimization.Hint: Optimize UI and performance for tablet/mobile devices

PerformanceLevel.Name: Performance Level
PerformanceLevel.Hint: Choose between visual quality (High) or performance (Low)

EnableQuickAdd.Name: Enable Quick Add Panel
EnableQuickAdd.Hint: Show floating panel for quickly adding favorite conditions

EnableUndoRedo.Name: Enable Undo/Redo
EnableUndoRedo.Hint: Allow undoing and redoing condition changes (Ctrl+Z / Ctrl+Y)

EnablePlugins.Name: Enable Plugin System
EnablePlugins.Hint: Allow third-party modules to extend Ragnar's Mark functionality
